description.tooltip: Espace dans les fichiers des bases de données
description.label: Fichiers et taille

queries.query: SELECT f.name AS [File Name] , f.physical_name AS [Physical Name], CAST((f.size/128.0) AS DECIMAL(15,2)) AS [Total Size in MB], CAST(f.size/128.0 - CAST(FILEPROPERTY(f.name, 'SpaceUsed') AS int)/128.0 AS DECIMAL(15,2)) AS [Available Space In MB], [file_id], fg.name AS [Filegroup Name] FROM sys.database_files AS f WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.data_spaces AS fg WITH (NOLOCK) ON f.data_space_id = fg.data_space_id OPTION (RECOMPILE);
